content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DRVFL
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --DRVFL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.172
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when record is derived in a --DRVFL is not null and is
  not equal to 'Y'
Outcome:
  Message: --DRVFL must be null or 'Y'
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '172'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Used to indicate a derived record. The value should
                  be Y or null.
                Document: SENDIG v3.1
                Section: Section 6.3.6
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when record is derived in a --DRVFL is not null and is not equal to 'Y'

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Used to indicate a derived record. The value should be Y or null.
